org.wicketstuff.datastores.memcached

Class MemcachedDataStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wicketstuff.datastores.memcached.MemcachedDataStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.wicket.pageStore.IDataStore

    public class MemcachedDataStore
extends Object
implements org.apache.wicket.pageStore.IDataStore
    IDataStore that stores the pages' bytes in Memcached A useful read about the way Memcached works can be found here.
